plot: Supergirl is hurt by a kryptonite-powered villain sent by Cadmus to attack National City. Superman blames Hank since the kryptonite was stolen from the DEO. In the meantime, Kara's first day at her new job doesn't go as planned when she meets her new boss.—Anonymous

CADMUS attacks National City with a kryptonite powered villain who ends up seriously hurting Supergirl. Superman blames Hank because the kryptonite was stolen from the DEO. Meanwhile, Kara's first day at her new job doesn't go as planned after she meets her new boss, Snapper Carr.

Just as Kara is about to begin her new career as a reporter, Cat announces she's leaving. Kara meets her boss, Snapper Carr who's not impressed with her and gives her the boot. John Corben, the assassin, Supergirl and Superman dealt with has been given a new exo-skeleton by a secret group who wants him to deal with the "aliens", in other words, Supergirl and Superman. When they try to deal with him, they discover his exo-skeleton is powered by Kryptonite and he nearly kills them. Superman tells John he think whoever made Corben's exo-skeleton got the Kryptonite from what the DEO has. Later other men who were fitted with the same exo-skeleton attack.—rcs0411@yahoo.com
